name: Maurice Salad
author: Angel
summary: This recipe is similar to one served at a popular downtown Detroit restaurant. It has lettuce, Swiss cheese, ham, turkey, olives, and a creamy dressing.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked ham, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
1 pound turkey breast, cut into strips
14 ounces Swiss cheese, cut into strips
½ cup sliced sweet gherkin pickles
1 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and shredded
directions: Prepare the dressing by whisking together the vinegar, lemon juice, onion juice, sugar, Dijon, dry mustard and mayonnaise
Add the parsley and egg; mix well
In a large bowl, combine the ham, turkey, cheese, and pickles
Add the dressing and mix well
Divide the lettuce among plates, top with salad, and garnish each plate with 2 olives
